text: Hagi Solomoni'ma karisiramine hosi afu agumpima vanoma hu vahetmima zamavare atruma hu'neana, 1tausen 400'a karisiraminki, vahe'mo'zama mani'ne'za ha'ma nehaza hosiramina 12tauseni'a hosiramine, ana hosirami erinoma vanoma nehia vahetamine, hosinema nente'za manisaza kumama tro'ma hunte'naza ran kumatmimpine, agrama nemania ran kumapi Jerusalemia ante'naze.
